text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr Close to 25% of worldwide COVID-19 deaths are American.
Americans make up 4% of the world's population.
Trump, Kushner and the administration are unqualified, incompetent and responsible for a completely inadequate response to this emergency. 

#TrumpDeathToll82K 
#TrumpGate
